message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both need to agree quickly due to inflation affecting our gains.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe a 50-50 split is most fair to both of us. This way we each get $5000, which is better for me and still good for you. If we keep negotiating, inflation will reduce our total value, so a fair split now benefits us both.
